scripts.test-e2e-collab-prod-chromium: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=chromium E2E_PORT=4000 E2E_EDITOR_MODE=rich-text-with-collab playwright test --project="chromium"
scripts.test-e2e-ci-chromium: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 pnpm run test-e2e-chromium
scripts.test-e2e-ci-firefox: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 pnpm run test-e2e-firefox
scripts.test-e2e-ci-webkit: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 pnpm run test-e2e-webkit
scripts.test-e2e-collab-ci-chromium: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 concurrently -k -s "first" "pnpm run collab" "pnpm run test-e2e-collab-chromium"
scripts.test-e2e-collab-ci-firefox: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 concurrently -k -s "first" "pnpm run collab" "pnpm run test-e2e-collab-firefox"
scripts.test-e2e-collab-ci-webkit: pnpm run prepare-ci && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 concurrently -k -s "first" "pnpm run collab" "pnpm run test-e2e-collab-webkit"
scripts.test-e2e-prod-ci-chromium: pnpm run prepare-ci-prod && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 pnpm run test-e2e-prod-chromium
scripts.test-e2e-collab-prod-ci-chromium: pnpm run prepare-ci-prod && cross-env E2E_PORT=4000 concurrently -k -s "first" "pnpm run collab" "pnpm run test-e2e-collab-prod-chromium"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-collab-legacy-chromium: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=chromium E2E_EDITOR_MODE=rich-text-with-collab E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="chromium"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-collab-legacy-firefox: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=firefox E2E_EDITOR_MODE=rich-text-with-collab E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="firefox"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-collab-legacy-webkit: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=webkit E2E_EDITOR_MODE=rich-text-with-collab E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="webkit"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-plain-legacy-chromium: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=chromium E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="chromium"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-plain-legacy-firefox: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=firefox E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="firefox"
scripts.debug-test-e2e-plain-legacy-webkit: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=webkit E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text E2E_EVENTS_MODE=legacy-events playwright test --debug --project="webkit"
